# tryc

Async try-catch.

## Usage

```js
tryc(function(done) {
  // do risky stuff
  // throw errors if necessary
  done();
}, function(err) {
  // err === error if any
});
```

## Installation

npm:

```bash
npm install tryc
```

component:

```bash
component install vesln/tryc
```

## Tests

### Running the tests

### All:

```bash
$ make test
```

### Node:

```bash
$ make test-node
```

### Browser:

```bash
$ make test-browser
```

### Test coverage

```bash
$ make coverage
```
